body: This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/website/50)

comment_regular_data.body:
@zx2c4 does this note look reasonable?

I will work on a more detailed set of security advisories later. For now, this is all I had time for.

--- Reviewed 2 of 2 files at r1. Review status: all files reviewed at latest revision, 2 unresolved discussions. --- *[toktok/index.md, line 33 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/50#-KaPwM4QoFVKE6_LqzpW:-KaPwM4R3oDvESexdnlp:b-c69jdz) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/3e963edec7dd32cb1afe4f626eec1cd991f5b70a/toktok/index.md#L33)):* > ```Markdown > > Neither the Tox protocol nor the implementation have undergone peer review, > and its exact security properties and network behaviour and not > ``` "and not" -> "are not" --- *[toktok/repos.md, line 8 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/50#-KaPwXI304U6ghMqaGxz:-KaPwXI304U6ghMqaGy-:b-8nvvgq) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/3e963edec7dd32cb1afe4f626eec1cd991f5b70a/toktok/repos.md#L8)):* > ```Markdown > --- > > You can file bugs against one of the TokTok projects on Github. Build status > ``` "bug reports" instead of "bugs". --- *Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/50#-:-KaPx2QvY5JwIexwmeXS:b-jbsf8z)*

*[toktok/index.md, line 36 at r1](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/50#-KaPxexVcLDpwTBAGODw:-KaPxexWQJeASx5XqCZ9:b-hofs78) ([raw file](https://github.com/toktok/website/blob/3e963edec7dd32cb1afe4f626eec1cd991f5b70a/toktok/index.md#L36)):*
> ```Markdown
> well-understood, yet. We are actively working on improving that situation.
> Until said peer review, Tox is not recommended for use cases that require
> proven high assurance security.
> ```

“proven, high-assurance security”

---


*Comments from [Reviewable](https://reviewable.io:443/reviews/toktok/website/50)*
<!-- Sent from Reviewable.io -->

The move to `repos.md` ought to be a separate commit.

---
